Judul: INTEGRATED MARKETING COMMUNICATION TO ENHANCE ACTIVE USER OF INTERNET BANKING SERVICE (Case Study Bank XYZ)
Abstrak: The development of technology and internet has been influence a lot of industry, including banking services. Electronic banking is enabling customer to do transaction without going to the bank. As one of the biggest bank in Indonesia, Bank XYZ always creates innovation for their services to ease the customer in doing banking transaction. One of their electronic banking services is Internet Banking. With this service, customer can perform their own banking transaction safely, anytime, anywhere, as long they have internet connection. Besides giving benefit for the customer, Internet Banking also give benefit for the bank itself. With this facility the bank could minimize their transaction cost, because the cost that is charged for internet banking is lower than conventional service. Even though internet banking giving a lot of easiness to the customer, but the acceptance of Internet Banking technology, which is had been nine years since launched, is relatively low. There is a significant difference between the registered user and the active user. The customer seems not too interested with this service. Based on this condition, the writer analyzed the external and internal condition of Bank XYZ as the service provider, and customers as the user. After that the result was mapped into SWOT analysis in order to see the connection between them. After analyzing the business situation and the customer behavior, the alternative solution given by the writer is a marketing communication strategy to educate the customer about the importance of doing transaction through internet banking which is easy and practical. The approaching concept that is used to develop marketing communications programs are Interest, Search, Action, Share, and Loyal. Interest thing is bait for the customer so they will find information and learn to use the internet banking services. After the customers are attracted to the service, the bank has to provide information that is easy to get. The bank has to build a relationship with the customers so they would use the service regularly and continuously. Some alternative programs are developed based on the objective of the marketing communication concept approach mentioned above. At the end there are two scenarios of recommended program. The implementation of the recommended program as the business solution, formed in an activity planning schedule and human resources needed for each recommended scenarios. The activity planning made for one year period. For the human resources, could be affording from internal, the existing employee, or from the external.
Kata Kunci: Bank, Internet Banking, Integrated Marketing Communication
